title: How to use an Esri Template

questions.question: Can FME create an XML Workspace document to be used as a template by the Geodatabase Writers?
What is the benefit of using an XML Workspace document or an Esri file geodatabase as a template?
options: Simplicity, it allows FME to make use of a pre-existing Geodatabase structure to allow for less upkeep between translations.
It does not require an ArcGIS license.
There is no benefit to using an XML Workspace or Geodatabase as a template.

questions.question: You have an existing Esri file geodatabase that contains data, and you want to use a template to create new feature classes in that existing Esri file geodatabase. Which template type should you use?
